CURRENT_TIMER.name: timer
CURRENT_TIMER.description: Check (when used without arguments) or change the timer of the current turn.

options.name: input
options.description: Change the timer, i.e. `3d20h30m`, or a single integer for hours (`0` to pause).

DEFAULT_TIMER.name: dtimer
DEFAULT_TIMER.description: Check (when used without arguments) or change the default timer.

options.name: input
options.description: Change the default timer, i.e. `3d20h30m`, or a single integer for hours (`0` to pause).

CHANGE_PLAYER_PREFERENCES.name: preferences
CHANGE_PLAYER_PREFERENCES.description: Displays the player game preferences menu (global preferences if used by DM).

CHANGE_SETTINGS.name: settings
CHANGE_SETTINGS.description: [Game-organizer-only] Change game settings, provided the game hasn't started yet.

CLAIM_PRETENDER.name: claim
CLAIM_PRETENDER.description: Claims a submitted pretender. Gives access to turn backups or turn reminders.

options.name: nation_number
options.description: A number that matches the pretender's index displayed by the `pretenders` command.

DELETE_GAME.name: deletegamenotchannel
DELETE_GAME.description: Permanently deletes the game hosted in this channel, while leaving the channel intact.

DELETE_GAME_AND_CHANNEL.name: deletegameandchannel
DELETE_GAME_AND_CHANNEL.description: Permanently deletes the game hosted in this channel, as well as the channel itself.

options.name: game_name
options.description: A game's name

DELETE_GAME_BY_DM.name: deletegamebydm
DELETE_GAME_BY_DM.description: [Dev-only] Permanently deletes the given game and its channel and role.

options.name: game_name
options.description: A game's name

DELETE_UNUSED_MAPS.name: deleteunusedmaps
DELETE_UNUSED_MAPS.description: [Dev-only] Deletes the maps on a target server which are currently not used by any ongoing game.

options.name: force
options.description: 'force' to actually delete the files

DELETE_UNUSED_MODS.name: deleteunusedmods
DELETE_UNUSED_MODS.description: [Dev-only] Deletes the mods on a target server which are currently not used by any ongoing game.

options.name: force
options.description: 'force' to actually delete the files

DEPLOY_BOT.name: deploy
DEPLOY_BOT.description: [Guild-owner-only] Deploy bot channels and roles. Can be used to restore categories and roles.

DISPLAY_SUBMITTED_PRETENDERS.name: pretenders
DISPLAY_SUBMITTED_PRETENDERS.description: Displays a list of submitted pretenders. Use their numbers for other pretender commands.

FORCE_HOST.name: forcehost
FORCE_HOST.description: [Game-organizer-only] In a game channel, forces a turn to roll immediately.

GET_CURRENT_TURN_FILE.name: turnfile
GET_CURRENT_TURN_FILE.description: [Game-player-only] Requests the claimed nation's current turn file, which is then sent by DM.

GET_MAPS_ON_SERVER.name: maps
GET_MAPS_ON_SERVER.description: Prints a list of the Dominions maps available on the servers.

options.name: game_type
options.description: The game for which to search; 'dom5' or 'dom6'

GET_MODS_ON_SERVER.name: mods
GET_MODS_ON_SERVER.description: Prints a list of the Dominions 5 or 6 mods available on the servers.

options.name: game_type
options.description: The game for which to search; 'dom5' or 'dom6'

GET_NATIONS.name: nations
GET_NATIONS.description: Prints a list of all the Dominions 5 or 6 nations and their numbers and filenames.

options.name: game_type
options.description: The game for which to search; 'dom5' or 'dom6'

GET_SCORES.name: scores
GET_SCORES.description: Get current turn's scores file. Only available if visible scoregraphs, or games which have ended.

GET_GAME_INFO.name: info
GET_GAME_INFO.description: In a game channel, prints this game's information and settings.

GET_GAMES_BY_LAST_HOSTED.name: lasthosted
GET_GAMES_BY_LAST_HOSTED.description: Prints a list of hosted games in this guild, or all games if sent by DM, sorted by last turn date.

GET_LIST_OF_HOSTED_GAMES.name: games
GET_LIST_OF_HOSTED_GAMES.description: Prints a list of all hosted games in this Discord guild, or all games if the command is sent by DM.

GET_LIST_OF_PROCESSING_TURNS.name: processing
GET_LIST_OF_PROCESSING_TURNS.description: Prints currently processing turns, ordered by the time at which they started doing so.

GET_LIST_OF_UNDONE_TURNS.name: undone
GET_LIST_OF_UNDONE_TURNS.description: In a game channel, prints a list nations whose turns' are undone or unfinished.

GET_LIST_OF_FREE_HOSTING_SLOTS.name: capacity
GET_LIST_OF_FREE_HOSTING_SLOTS.description: Prints the list of servers with the number of free hosting slots in each.

GET_MASTER_PASSWORD.name: password
GET_MASTER_PASSWORD.description: [Organizer-only] Sends the game's master password by DM.

GET_PATREON_LINK.name: patreon
GET_PATREON_LINK.description: Prints a link to the Patreon for those who wish to support the project. Thank you!

GET_SETTING_VALUE_ACROSS_GAMES.name: values
GET_SETTING_VALUE_ACROSS_GAMES.description: [Dev-only] Receive a list of the values of a setting currently in use in every Dominions game.

options.name: setting_key
options.description: A game setting key

HELP.name: help
HELP.description: Print a list of the available commands.

HOST_GAME.name: host
HOST_GAME.description: Host a Dom5/6 game. You will be asked a series of settings by DM to configure it.

options.name: server_name
options.description: Server on which to host game. Check with `/capacity`

options.name: game_type
options.description: The game for which to search; 'dom5' or 'dom6'

HOST_GAME_WEB.name: host_web
HOST_GAME_WEB.description: Host a Dom5 game using the website interface.

KILL_GAME_PROCESS.name: kill
KILL_GAME_PROCESS.description: Shuts down the game's process. Useful to relaunch it to fix common errors. Doesn't delete anything.

LAUNCH_GAME_PROCESS.name: launch
LAUNCH_GAME_PROCESS.description: In a game channel, launches a game's process. Use if the bot mentions the **game** being offline.

PAUSE_GAME.name: pause
PAUSE_GAME.description: In a game channel, pauses or unpauses a game.

PIN_SETTINGS.name: pinsettings
PIN_SETTINGS.description: Sends and pins the current game settings to the channel.

POST_NEWS.name: post
POST_NEWS.description: [Dev-only] Posts a message across all clockwork_news channels.

options.name: news_message
options.description: The message to post on the news channels of associated guilds.

PRUNE_DATA.name: prunedata
PRUNE_DATA.description: [Dev-only] Prunes obsolete player data, like leftover game data or preferences from games.

REMOVE_PRETENDER.name: remove
REMOVE_PRETENDER.description: In a game channel, removes a submitted pretender for this game.

options.name: nation_number
options.description: A number that matches the pretender's index displayed; a.k.a. the nation_number.

REPLACE_BOT_ROLE.name: replace
REPLACE_BOT_ROLE.description: [Guild-owner-only] Replaces one of the bot roles by a different existing role.

options.name: old_role_id
options.description: The bot's role id to be replaced.

options.name: new_role_id
options.description: The new role's id to take its place.

RESET_PORT.name: resetport
RESET_PORT.description: [Organizer-only] Assigns a new port to the game (or the same one if it's found to be free).

RESTABLISH_GAME.name: restablish
RESTABLISH_GAME.description: Restablishes a game's deleted channel and/or role by creating new ones if none are found.

options.name: game_name
options.description: A game's name.

RESTART_GAME.name: restartandgobacktolobby
RESTART_GAME.description: [Game-organizer-only] Restarts the game back to the pretender lobby; players must resubmit.

options.name: delete_pretenders
options.description: `True` if you want the previously submitted pretenders to be deleted

options.name: roll_input
options.description: A roll. Adding a `+` after a dice expression will make them explosive, i.e. `5d6++10d10+`.

ROLLBACK_TURN.name: rollback
ROLLBACK_TURN.description: [Game-organizer-only] Rollbacks to the previous turn. Only keeps backups of a few turns back.

SET_LOG_LEVEL.name: setloglevel
SET_LOG_LEVEL.description: [Dev-only] Sets the verbosity level of the logging functions to the console and files.

options.name: verbosity_level
options.description: The numerical level of logging verbosity, inclusive from 0 (lean) to 2 (verbose).

SET_ORGANIZER.name: setorganizer
SET_ORGANIZER.description: Sets a member as the organizer of this game. If an organizer exists; replaces them.

options.name: member_mention
options.description: A mention to the new organizer (@Username#0000).

SHUFFLE.name: shuffle
SHUFFLE.description: Shuffles a list of space-separated elements, i.e. mentions to members to create a draft order.

options.name: list
options.description: A space-separated list of things, i.e mentions or numbers

START_GAME.name: start
START_GAME.description: [Game-organizer-only] Starts the game. Can take long depending on size (even > 20 minutes).

SUBSCRIBE_TO_GAME.name: subscribe
SUBSCRIBE_TO_GAME.description: Assigns yourself the role of the game. Claiming a pretender assigns it automatically.

SUBSTITUTE_PLAYER.name: sub
SUBSTITUTE_PLAYER.description: [Game-organizer-only] Transfers the claim on a pretender to another player.

options.name: nation_number
options.description: A nation number that matches the pretender's index displayed by the pretenders command.

options.name: member_mention
options.description: A mention to the player who will be taking over (@Username#0000).

TOGGLE_CLEANER.name: togglecleaner
TOGGLE_CLEANER.description: [Dev-only] Sets whether the bot will regularly clean unused map and mod files.

TOGGLE_LOG_TO_FILE.name: togglelogtofile
TOGGLE_LOG_TO_FILE.description: [Dev-only] Sets whether the bot will log its prints to files.

UNCLAIM_PRETENDER.name: unclaim
UNCLAIM_PRETENDER.description: Removes your claim from your submitted pretender (without deleting the submitted pretender).

options.name: nation_number
options.description: A nation number that matches the pretender's index displayed by the pretenders command.

UNDEPLOY_BOT.name: undeploybotfromguild
UNDEPLOY_BOT.description: [Guild-owner-only] CAREFUL. Will attempt to delete ALL deployment from bot.

UNSUBSCRIBE_FROM_GAME.name: unsubscribe
UNSUBSCRIBE_FROM_GAME.description: Removes the role of a game from yourself. Unclaiming/removing pretender does this.

UPDATE_HELP_CHANNELS.name: updatehelp
UPDATE_HELP_CHANNELS.description: [Dev-only] Re-writes the help information on the guild's help channel.

options.name: guild_id
options.description: A guild ID, if only one channel requires updating.

UPLOAD_FILE_TO_SERVER.name: upload
UPLOAD_FILE_TO_SERVER.description: Upload dom5/dom6 map or mod to the server through google drive.
UPLOAD_FILE_TO_SERVER.longDescription: Allows you to upload a dom5 or dom6 map/mod to the server through google drive. To use it, first specify the game type (`dom5` or `dom6`), and then add the google drive file sharing link at the end of the command (which can be found when you right click a file on the drive website and click on Get Shareable Link). The package must be a .zip file containing the mod or map as is meant to be extracted into the mods or maps folder. If files with the same name exist in the server, they will not be overwritten.

options.name: game_type
options.description: The game for which to upload; 'dom5' or 'dom6'

options.name: link
options.description: A google drive file ID or link.
